name: Thai Sukiyaki Recipe With Sauce
description: Thai sukiyaki recipe with a light broth, many protein options and an array of vegetables, plus an irresistible nam jim suki sauce.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, combine your choice of meat with egg white, cornstarch, sesame oil, and oyster sauce. Mix well to coat the meat and refrigerate for at least one hour.

itemListElement.text: Combine the paste and the remaining ingredients, except for the sesame seeds, in a pan over medium-low heat, stirring continuously.

itemListElement.text: Fill a pot with water and place it over medium heat. Bring to a boil before adding the marinated meat.
